title: Suspected hog bristle brushes seized
text:
More 
The authorities have confiscated over 90 paintbrushes which were allegedly made of hog's bristles with a "halal" logo stamped on the handle. 
According to Berita Harian , the items were seized following raids carried out by the Ministry of Domestic Trade, Cooperatives, and Consumerism (KPDNKK) at a hardware store and a supermarket in Kuala Lumpur. 
The first raid started at about 2.20pm and resulted in 30 brushes being seized.
